name: Ordinary
text:
I stared, caught in a window.

/ The staff, the cook,/ The cleaning crew: they/ Walked around/ In a Miyazaki light./ It wasn’t surreal/ But it should’ve been.

/ They moved in a shredded screen.

/ Disjointed by the blinds,/ Their serving trays were/ Striped, and their/ Arms were striped./ They dressed and walked/ In dismembered/ Dizzy/ Plaid./
